title: Anneliese Dodds – 2022 Letter to Jake Berry Over Conservative Tax Cuts
author: admin
summary: The letter sent by Anneliese Dodds, the Chair of the Labour Party, to Jake Berry, the Chair of the Conservative Party, on 2 October 2022.
